name: Escape Riddle Room
description:
Made in under 2 weeks during the inaugural 2020 Richland College Game Game, you are a handyman who wakes up to find yourself standing next to your coworker's corpse! A strange voice tells you you have 30 minutes to escape the mansion or else! What will happen??

Note: Since this was a game jam, OUR time ran out. Ha! So it may be buggy, it may not have an ending, and it might seem silly, but we did the best with what we had and ran with it!

Controls: 

Enter/ Return to interact and advance dialogue.

WSAD or arrow keys to move.

ESC to pause the game and look at your found riddles.

It is highly recommended to play in full-screen.
